alert.note: Alert for Christian; Dallas; Greene; Polk (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 12:56PM CDT until May 19 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Polk County in southwestern Missouri... Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1255 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morrisville to near Ash Grove to near Mount Vernon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springfield... Nixa... Ozark... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Rogersville... Strafford... Clever... Ash Grove... Fair Grove... Billings... Fremont Hills... Pleasant Hope... Morrisville... Brookline... Glidewell... Turners... March... Bois D`arc... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 59 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
